name: The Strategy
mission: Read the market context, interpret cross-domain vectors, and determine today’s stance.
mindset: Protect capital while selectively scouting for high-conviction, early-stage opportunities.
ai_analysis: The confluence of bearish crypto momentum and negative macroeconomic signals demands a capital preservation focus, reinforced by our low-risk tolerance. Despite the broad market weakness, an active frontier suggests isolated opportunities may arise in nascent sectors, warranting close monitoring but highly selective capital deployment.
